See Invisibility (W2 Divi): Reveals invisible and ethereal creatures and objects for 1 hr
Seeming (W5 Illu): R30' Changes the appearance of targets (save Charisma negates; Investigation detects) for 8 hr
Sending (W3 Evoc): Self can exchange 25-word messages with a familiar target
Sequester (W7 Tran): Touched object or willing creature becomes hidden and enters suspended animation until a specified trigger
Shapechange (W9 Tran): Polymorphs self into a familiar living creature of equal or lesser CR for concentration up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Shatter (W2 Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 3d8 HP thunder (save Constitution half; inorganic creatures have disadvantage) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Shield (W1 Abju): Reaction gives +5 AC and immunity to Magic Missile until the next turn
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 2d8 HP lightning and loss of reactions until its next turn
Silent Image (W1 Illu): R60' Creates a 15' cube movable illusion (Investigation detects) for concentration up to 10 min
Simulacrum (W7 Illu): Uses snow to create an obedient copy of a target creature with half its hit points
Sleep (W1 Ench): R90' 20' radius puts to sleep 5d8 hit points of creatures, starting with those with the least hit points, for 1 min (damage or shaking wakens) [+Level affects +2d8 hit points of creatures]
Sleet Storm (W3 Conj): R150' 40' radius douses flames and inflicts difficult terrain and falling prone (save Dexterity negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Slow (W3 Tran): R120' 6 targets in a 40' cube suffer half Speed, -2 AC and Dexterity saves, loss of reactions, and no more than 1 action per rd (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Spider Climb (W2 Tran): Touched can crawl on walls and ceilings for concentration up to 1 hr
Stinking Cloud (W3 Conj): R90' 20' radius inflicts loss of actions (save Constitution negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Stone Shape (W4 Tran): Reshapes touched 5' cube of stone
Stoneskin (W4 Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Suggestion (W2 Ench): R30' Target follows a reasonable suggestion (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 8 hr
Sunbeam (W6 Evoc): 60' line inflicts 6d8 HP radiant and blindness for 1 rd (Constitution half HP only) for concentration up to 1 min
Sunburst (W8 Evoc): R150' 60' radius inflicts 12d6 HP and blindness (save Constitution half HP only; an additional save each turn ends blindness) for 1 min
Symbol (W7 Abju): Inscribes a touch object with a permanent glyph that, when triggered, inflicts a choice of harmful magic effectâ€”10d10 HP necrotic (save Constitution half), arguing for 1 min (save Constitution negates), frightened and fleeing for 1 min (save Wisdom negates), overwhelmed with despair for 1 min (save Charisma negates), insane for 1 min (save Intelligence negates), incapacitated by pain for 1 min (save Constitution negates), asleep for 10 min or until shaken or harmed (save Wisdom negates), or stunned for 1 min (save Wisdom negates)
Tasha's Hideous Laughter (W1 Ench): R30' Inflicts ROFL (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Telekinesis (W5 Tran): R60' Self can mentally move a 1000 lb object 30' per rd (save Strength negates) for concentration up to 10 min
Telepathy (W8 Evoc): Self can communicate mentally with a willing target for 1 day
Teleport (W7 Conj): R10' Teleports an unattended object or self and 8 allies any distance; greater familiarity with the destination improves accuracy
Teleportation Circle (W5 Conj): R10' Creates a portal that provides a link to similar circles for 1 rd
Tenser's Floating Disk (W1 Conj): R30' 3'x1" force disk floats 3' above the ground 20' behind self and holds 500 lbs for 1 hr [R]
Thunderwave (W1 Evoc): 15' cube inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (save Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Time Stop (W9 Tran): Self can take 1d4+1 turns while no time passes for others; affecting another creature or moving more than 1000' away ends
Tongues (W3 Divi): Touched understands any language and is universally understood for 1 hr
True Polymorph (W9 Tran): R30' Transforms the target creature (save Wisdom negates) or object for concentration up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP; concentrating for a full hr makes the change permanent
True Seeing (W6 Divi): Touched gains 120' truesight, sees magically concealed doors, and can see into the Ethereal Plane for 1 hr
True Strike (W0 Divi): R30' Self gains advantage on the next attack on the target within 1 rd
Unseen Servant (W1 Conj): R60' Invisible force with AC 10, 1 hit point, and Strength 2 can move 15' per rd and performs simple tasks for 1 hr or until damaged [R]
Vampiric Touch (W3 Necr): Touch inflicts 3d6 HP, and self regains half as many, for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Wall Of Fire (W4 Evoc): R120' Creates a 60'x20'x1' wall or a 20'x20'x1' ring that inflicts 5d8 HP fire (save Dexterity half) within 10' of a chosen side for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Force (W5 Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10' impassable force panels for concentration up to 10 min
Wall Of Ice (W6 Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10'x1' panels, with AC 12 and 30 HP each, that inflict 10d6 HP cold (save Dexterity half) initially and, if broken, 5d6 HP cold to creatures passing through (save Constitution half) for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +2d6 HP initially and +1d6 HP when passing]
Wall Of Stone (W5 Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10'x6" or 10'x20'x3" panels for concentration up to 10 min
Water Breathing (W3 Tran): R30' 10 targets can breathe underwater for 24 hr [R]
Web (W2 Conj): R60' 20' cube restrains creatures (save Dexterity negates and Strength frees) for concentration up to 1 hr; burning the web inflicts 2d4 HP fire
Weird (W9 Illu): R120' 30' radius inflicts frightened and 4d10 HP psychic each rd (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Wish (W9 Conj): Mimics an 8th level spell or otherwise alters reality with few limits
Witch Bolt (W1 Evoc): R30' Ranged spell inflicts 1d12 HP lightning per rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d12 HP initial]
Magic Notes:
Arcane Recovery: Can recover 5 spell slot levels (level 6 maximum) during a short rest once per long rest
Illusion Savant: Can copy illusion spells into spellbook for half cost
Illusory Self: Can use a reaction to cause an attack on self to miss once per short rest
Improved Minor Illusion: Knows the Minor Illusion cantrip; effects can include both a sound and an image
Malleable Illusions: Can modify self illusions throughout their durations
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the wizard spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Notes
Validation Errors:
Fighter-Feinting Attack Selectable Feature: Requires fighter level >= 3
Fighter-Lunging Attack Selectable Feature: Requires fighter level >= 3
